title: Kim Kardashian shares photos of Psalm bonding with True and Khloe
text:
Kim Kardashian shared adorable shots of her baby boy Psalm spending quality time with his cousin True and aunt Khloe on Thursday.

Little Psalm, five-months, looked like a bundle of joy as one-year-old True and Khloe cuddled and tickled him.

Proving she was simply smitten with the family moment, the cosmetics and fragrance company founder captioned the shots simply 'OBSESSED.'

Family time: Kim Kardashian shared photos of son Psalm bonding with his cousin True and aunt Khloe on Thursday

Love it! Proving she was simply smitten with the family moment, the cosmetics and fragrance company founder captioned the shots simply 'OBSESSED'

Khloe shared the same set, captioning it: 'This is LOVE.'

In the photos Psalm was clad in a tan onesie, little grey leggings and a bib.

True first leaned forward, looking at her baby cousin intently before leaning in to caress his cheek.

In another picture aunt Khloe doted on the baby, seen wearing a wintery coat and beanie hat as she played with the giggling little guy.

Cutie: In the photos Psalm was clad in a tan onesie, little grey leggings and a bib

Aw: True first leaned forward, looking at her baby cousin intently before leaning in to caress his cheek

Giggling: In another picture aunt Khloe doted on the baby, seen wearing a wintery coat and beanie hat as she played with the giggling little guy

During this weekend's Keeping Up With The Kardashians Kim revealed that Khloe could have been the first in the family to meet Psalm if her sister's surrogate happened to give birth while the rest of the Kardashian clan was at the Met Gala together back in May.

Though Psalm didn't come during the May 6 gala, the timing was certainly close. Kim's baby boy was welcomed into the world just days later on May 9 in LA.

Kim made it clear she wasn't going to miss the event, especially since she was Vogue's May cover girl.

Packed calendar: Kim Kardashian had a backup plan in case her son Psalm was born while she was attending the Met Gala back in May, pictured above at the event

Oh baby! Though Psalm didn't come during the May 6 gala, the timing was certainly close. Kim's baby boy was welcomed into the world just days later

In a confessional video she told the cameras: 'I just have to get to the Met and back before the baby comes.'

'[The surrogate] is due in eight days, but I'm gonna stay committed to the Met. I mean, it has taken eight months to get our Met look perfect, and I committed to it and I can't miss this.'

'I just hope she doesn’t have the baby early,' Kim went on.

Whirlwind trip: In a confessional video she told the cameras: 'I just have to get to the Met and back before the baby comes'

Here's the plan... In a separate scene she assured her surrogate that everything would be taken care of while joining her for a doctor's check-up

In a separate scene she assured her surrogate that everything would be taken care of while joining her for a doctor's check-up.

'My attorney has my sister's number,' Kim told her surrogate, reminding the surrogate: '...I'm gonna be with two of my sisters, and my mom and my husband. Khloé is hoping that this will happen while I'm gone because she wants the baby.'

Kim was anxious when the day of the gala finally arrived.

High stress: When Kim sat down to prep her hair and makeup on the day of the gala she admitted her worries were 'through the roof'

As she sat down to prep her hair and makeup she admitted her worries were 'through the roof.'

'My anxiety is through the roof. But luckily I haven't heard from my surrogate so I hope there's no emergency today, and we make it through tomorrow when we get home.'

Luckily Psalm wasn't born until days later on May 9.

The now five-month-old is the youngest of Kim's kids with Kanye West. They also share daughter North, six, as well as son Saint, three, and daughter Chicago, one.
description: Kim Kardashian shared adorable shots of her baby boy Saint spending quality time with his cousin True and aunt Khloe on Thursday.
